features: 【4-in-1 Karaoke Microphone】— Besides a wireless microphone, the BONAOK mic can be used as a portable Bluetooth speaker, MP3 player.

【Controllable Dynamic LED Light】— Music~ 27 colorful LED lights will flicker with the rhythm of the music. Higher volume, brighter light, perfectly creating a karaoke atmosphere for you. If long pressing "M", the LED light will appear/ disappear.
【Excellent Live Show】— Multi-layer denoising head, powerful stereo speaker, professional buttons, and brief layout, all allow you to enjoy an aural carnival. Let this microphone light up your party.

【Easy to Use】— Via Bluetooth and memory function, the microphone can be easily connected to your phone. Also, support TF card plug and play(not included). Wherever you'd like to sing or listen to music, this moving speaker will meet all of your needs.

【Great Gift Ideas】— BONAOK microphone is a party favor for 4 5 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 years old toddlers, girls, boys, and teenagers. A great gift idea for holidays and activities(Valentine's Day, Easter, Christmas, Thanksgiving, New Year, etc).What you get（Q78 microphone,charging cable,giftable box, NO BLACK CASE for this color)

If you feel that the sound is too low, turn the VOLUME and ECHO keys to maximum. Package includes: 1 x BONAOK Karaoke Wireless Microphone 1 x Micro USB Cable 1 x Instruction Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is AWESOME
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loves music so when I had seen one of these online, of course I purchased it. It's amazing! You could take it to Karaoke night it's so awesome. I thought it said, it was for a kid, it's for our granddaughter now lol.So many different options for voice, lights, noise, and it's very sturdy. Very well made and is going to bring our granddaughter a thousand smiles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FUN Family Night
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a last minute surprise addition to a mommy and daughters "girls night" and we had a blast! I have a 10 yo and 12 yo and I could not believe how much they loved this mic. It was easy to charge and set-up and made me laugh so much. We danced and sang for an hour before moving on to the movie. Bonus tip, get yourself a disco ball to add to the evening of fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this microphone
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one of these for my daughter and she loved it so much. I ended up ordering two more for her brothers. I loved the variety of colors that are sold. The microphone can be turned up but not to the point where it's obnoxious. It's easy to use and can connect to any device. It's perfect for karaoke and YouTube. My kids have used it for hours, well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a good product for the price. The lights are a really fun feature. Hold the power button down until the colored light come on, I wasn’t holding it down long enough the first few tries. Wish the mic volume was louder, but it us a cheap mic, so you get what you pay for. Still great for a night of fun with friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great white elephant gift!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item with few expectations, considering the low price, as part of a white elephant gift exchange. People were so excited by this item that they practically fought each other trying to 'steal' it. Turned out to be a fairly well performing mic, it was easy to use, it was loud enough, and the lights were a big hit, no other gift in this event came close. I'm probably going to buy this again next year for the same party/group of people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love it !!!!
reviews.reviewText: It's super good, my kids love it so much ! Good material and resistant!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and connect with bluetooth
reviews.reviewText: My 11 year old granddaughter absolutely loved this for Christmas. She is driving me crazy with it, but all tha tmatters is she is having a good time singing and talking with the microphone. It is plenty loud!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Volume switches aren't precise
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun toy but the switches that control the volume and music volume aren't precise. I need to move the. At least 1/3 the way up before any sound comes out of the speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Surprisingly Good Kid's Karaoke Microphone with a Few Quirks
reviews.reviewText: This Microphone stands out among the numerous options available for kids' karaoke mics. Having tried a few in the past and faced disappointment, I was pleasantly surprised by the performance of this one.One of the key features that set this microphone apart is its wireless functionality. It connects seamlessly to a larger speaker, transforming the setup into a mini karaoke system. Alternatively, it can also operate as a standalone Bluetooth speaker. I particularly enjoy pairing it with my Android phone, and it has become my new favorite way to play podcasts, especially with the Echo feature turned on. The added bonus of flashing lights enhances the experience, creating a unique and entertaining atmosphere.The built-in speakers deliver surprisingly good sound quality, making it enjoyable for both karaoke sessions and regular music playback. The versatility of this device as both a microphone and a Bluetooth speaker adds to its overall value.However, the user experience is hindered by the poorly designed instructions, which are included as images. This drawback almost compelled me to deduct a point from the rating. Navigating through the various features and settings can be confusing, and it seems there is more this microphone can do than the instructions reveal. I suspect that a five-year-old might find it challenging to operate, and even their parents might struggle to unlock its full potential.Despite the instructional shortcomings, the Microphone is undeniably fun, of good quality, and aesthetically pleasing. While I believe it has more capabilities than I've explored, the limited guidance provided means that some features may remain undiscovered for many users. Nevertheless, as a Bluetooth speaker and a portable microphone, it fulfills its primary functions admirably, making it a worthwhile addition for home parties, outdoor events, or as a thoughtful gift for kids.

I don't usually right reviews of any sorts, but I felt compelled to share my review of this mic! In one word- awesome. The sound is impressive and this thing provided hours of fun over the holidays! Just went on to Apple Music to listen to karaoke playlist and it was the best! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality, great finish and packaging for a gift
reviews.reviewText: 4 stars because we don't give 5,5,5 just-take-it reviews. They product was bought as a gift for a girl and with the rose pink colour it makes a great gift. Product looks and feels quality and has the promised karaoke features. The speaker is built into the mic so don't expect it to be party loud but you can connect it to a Bluetooth speaker for that. Based on our experience so far i would recommend it though I haven't used other devices to compare. Sellers delivery was on time and package in excellent condition(it comes with a hard shell case also).
Mikrofon für die Kleinen, mit Bluetooth zum mitsingen TOP
Mi papá quedó encantado con el micrófono! No pudimos conectarlo con el cable, pero con bluetooth funciona perfecto.
